trends: There have been no other sightings in Sun City Center
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was just leaving deny's restuarnt in sun city center (right off hiway us 674), and i looked up and notice an dary gray\black object slowly rising upward at a slight angle ( object about the size of a pea a arms lenght, but below the clouds). i watched it for about 30 seconds ad then grabbed my dslr w\ 30x zoom. as i switched it on and switced from the back lcd display to the lcd thur the lens, i was still able to see it but as i zoomed out to 30x,it was gone, and i was unable to visually view it without the camer any more. i got out of my suv and viewed te entire but was unable o see it. not sure if this was related to the othe siting i had reported this morning, but the angles of both siting would have placed it over the apollo beach area.
